snippet.title: A Lullaby Of Colors VR - Trailer
snippet.description:
A Lullaby Of Colors VR. Blissful psychedelic relaxation experience for VR. Fly through breathtakingly beautiful worlds of endless sweet-tasting colors and gentle sounds. Great for relaxing, open-eyed meditation, or jaw-dropping drug-free tripping. 

Recommended usage: play before bed for 5-20 minutes daily to forget your worries, relax, and experience colorful gentle dreams.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/992960/A_Lullaby_of_Colors_VR/
Itch: https://andyman404.itch.io/lullaby-of-color
Viveport: https://www.viveport.com/apps/88a0967f-279f-4d32-a5f2-c174162a8816/A_Lullaby_of_Colors/

This game was previously called "Chromesthesia".
